amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6552, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 421.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary disciple with respect to the motion to concur in the House amendment to amendment SA 4 with an amendment (SA 6552) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 31. Record Vote Number: 408.
Point of order that the motion to concur in the House amendment to amendment SA 4 with an amendment (SA 6552) violates section 306 of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 6552.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 6552 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Leahy. In the nature of a substitute.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6552, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 421.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6552, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 421.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary disciple with respect to the motion to concur in the House amendment to amendment SA 4 with an amendment (SA 6552) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 31. Record Vote Number: 408.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6552 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Leahy.
